verses.roman:
śuni' ānandita haila upādhyāyera mana
prabhu tāṅre kahila,--'kaha kṛṣṇera varṇana'

synonyms: śuni'—hearing; ānandita—very pleased; haila—became; upādhyāyera mana—the mind of Upādhyāya; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—to him; kahila—spoke; kaha kṛṣṇera varṇana—just try to describe Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Raghupati Upādhyāya was very pleased to hear the Lord's blessings. The Lord then asked him to describe Kṛṣṇa.
